targets.query:
from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PF")
  |> last(column:"_value")
       |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /100.00}))

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "f")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["utility_type"] != "energy") 
  |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "T")
  |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
      |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value + 49.00}))

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I")
  |> last(column:"_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I")
      |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last)

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RPM") 
  |> last()

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "V")
  |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"]) 
        |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 18.00}))

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["utility_type"] != "energy") 
      |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last)

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "V")
  |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "E")
  |> last(column:"_value")

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ap_total")
  |> last(column:"_value")
 
  |

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RH_H")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RH_H")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "LH_L")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "E")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "E")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start:-5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["utility_type"] != "comp") 
  |> last()

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["utility_type"] != "comp") 
          |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last)

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RPM")
  |> last(column:"_value")

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "E") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, column: "_value")
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /1000.00 * 0.53/1000.0}))

from(bucket: "HAMEEM")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "HAMEEM")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RPM")
          |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last)
